column4: I need some help. I am trying to install Ubuntu 10.04 64 bit on an AMD64 computer, yet I don't seem to understand partitioning for it. I do not want to erase my entire hard drive.
I had 32 bit on my desktop, and it's install process was great. I do not know how to partition this one correctly to not screw it up.
Then getcha geeky glasses on and read about partitions, your about to learn how computer software devides physical media :)
